# bitPattern

**Instance Property**

The bit pattern of the value’s encoding.

## Declaration

```swift
var bitPattern: UInt16 { get }
```

## Discussion

The bit pattern matches the binary interchange format defined by the [http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/servlet/opac?punumber=4610933].
